text: Wei xinzhe jiang hanjiao xinshimen:“Nandao women yuanlai bu shi tong nimen zai yiqi de ma?” Tamen [xinshi] jiang shuo:“Shi de, dan nimen shi nimen ziji xianrule mihuo zhong, nimen dengdai [women miewang], huaiyi [liu da xinyang deng], wangxiang qipianle nimen, zhidao an la de mingling lailin. Pian zei [emo] ceng jie an la de mingyi qipian nimen.
